content.detailedDescription: At about 4:55 am on july 13th 2011, i stepped out onto the back porch to throw some garbage into the trash can. when i go outside at night i always look at the stars for a minute or two before going back inside, which i did on this particular night as well. as i looked south-west, i suddenly saw a light that was slowly moving toward me in a south-west to north-east direction. for the first 5-10 seconds, i figured it was a helicopter or commercial jet. but this obect made no noise at all, and it consisted of one large, pulsating white light, and another small white light that remained a constant size and brightness. i could not see the shape of the object, only the lights. i watched in awe as it moved in a straight line from the south-west to the north-east over my house, still making no sounds at all. these two lights gradually became dimmer until i could no longer see them. the entire sighting lasted only 2 or 3 minutes. i felt wonder and excitement, because i have wanted to a see ufo since i was 11 years old. i also felt a little angry at myself for not thinking to grab a camera until after the object was gone. i went back inside and quickly wrote down the sighting, still wondering what this object was. i hope to see many more things like this in the future.
content.summary: One small white light and one larger pulsating white light on one craft

content.detailedDescription: Star-gazing at the hunting camp that night my girlfriend and i observed a bright white dot moving steadily from west to east from over lake superior. as we watched the object for a couple minutes it came to an abrupt halt, then a couple seconds later three bright white dots which blended in well with the overhead stars took off in different directions in the blink of an eye. i turned to her and asked, "did we just see that?" she agreed we saw something unexplainable.
content.summary: Star-like object moved steadily, stopped, then it and 2 other star-like objects sped off in diffrent directions at a very high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: Got up to use the bathroom which like most guys do out side look up i see lights five of them. in triangle shape it was moving fast toward the north it kind of spooked me .
content.summary: Triangle

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i are traveling back from our vacation from nebraska to dallas and switching drivers every two hours and i moved to the passenger side about 3 in the afternoon and a very windy day from the startof the trip and lots of clouds coming from the south to north east patern and i was looking up looking at the beautiful clouds ect and all of a sudden as we are just about to leave kansas to oklahoma i see this huge orb above and around maybe 10000 ft or less moving west to east darting in and out of the clouds. this was whiter than the whitest cloud that i have ever seen with a few crystal sun like flares coming off the orb. i saw this for about 15 secs total and with out any clouds around it at times just as plain as you can get. 

we are traveling north to south and the clouds approx south to north and the orb from west to east...The sun was at the west at 3:30pm..


so you know how big this was you could put about 75 or so sm jetsabout the size where leave the chem trails.. sm but this orb was not hard to miss. inside the orb was white white white and swirling kind of look and you could not see the debt of it cause it never turned it just was moving as if not to be seen west to east only. i am describing it to my wife and she is trying to pull over as she was freaking out..Oh well but this is true and i would die before i would lie about it. thanks for listening..Ronnie


feel free to contact me anytime for futher info
content.summary: Hughe white orb darting in and out in the clouds from east to west

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and another person went outside last night(9-18-11) at around 10:30 pm to go in the hot tub. this was in ukiah, ca in mendocino county which is about two hours north of san fransisco. we were casually observing the night sky when we both noticed a very bright "star," however within a minute we both saw that the star hovered to the right a little bit rather quickly, then to the left. it would hover then shift a little, then hover some more and the strange thing was that it would hover in a kind of an arc pattern. not a direct shift to the left or right. it continued to do this hovering thing for at least two hours (we came inside about 20 minutes after we first observed it) but we went to the back door a few more times to see if it was still there, which is was, and around 12:30 am went to sleep. 

it's hovering behavior was too fast to be a helicopter and it also seemed too high in the sky to be a helicopter - plus we didn't hear any chopper sounds. it was east of us maybe all the way over to lake county. we tracked it against a structure to be sure it was moving. over the two hours it moved more towards the west and by the time we went to bed it was about 85 degrees up from the horizon. 

we star gaze quite a bit - our rural area provides beautiful night skies and we often see shooting starts and satellites but this was totally different.
 
i am a professional person, as is my friend and neither one of us are particularly interested in ufo's. we have no idea what the heck this was though so i thought i'd report it somewhere, did a search on the internet and found this web site. 

we set up our telescope tonight but so far nothing has appeared like what we saw last night.
content.summary: Bright star-like thing that hovered around for two hours. random smaller red light intermittedly flashed

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the hood of my car looking at the sky and just over the my roof of my house, above the trees i see multiple(12-15)aircraft flying in a v shaped formation. at first i thought birds. but they were moveing too fast. no flapping wings, no lights no sound. they appeared grey in color and it looked blury around them. they were similar in shape to the stealth bomber.
   i grew up in the military and have been around every kind of aircraft made, flying or not. i live next to dfw airport also. which makes this even more wierd. that many aircraft flying in dfw's airspace could not have gone unnoticed! i can not believe i am the only one to see this. even at night they were in plain site. flying north to south possibly below radar.
content.summary: 12-15 v shaped aircraft no lights no sound flying in v shaped formation

content.detailedDescription:
I first submitted a report about a sighting i had around 5:15 am in the sky high above james peak (continental divide) on august 29th, 2011.  in the 21 days since, i have witnessed similar sightings, in the same general vicinity, for most of the clear mornings (cannot be seen when cloudy).  there is a flashing, very bright object(brightest object in sky besides moon)in the sky high above the continental divide.  the object at times appears still, but then clearly moves, making short jutting motions in erratic directions.  for the first several nights (mornings, actually  - i viewed it at varying times between 3:00 am and 6:30 am when the sun is up) i tried to capture this object on any and all of our cameras, but had no luck.  all the cameras could capture was blackness. finally, on september 4th, i was able to capture still photos and video of the object on my blackberry phone (pictures/video attached).  at times when millions of stars are visible to the naked eye, this is the only object that the camera on my phone would pick up, that evening and in several evenings since.  perhaps this isn't so odd, considering this object appears to be the brightest object in the sky, although many of the stars are nearly as bright, just not quite as large to the naked eye. 

strangely, on the evening of august 30th, around 9:30 pm, i observed a very similar object high in the sky to the northwest of sheep mountain (above the pole creek valley).  at that point i thought for sure my eyes were deceiving me, as i was seeing the same thing i had been observing in the sky nearly 180 degrees to the south (and at a different time - 9:30 pm vs 3:00 - 6:00 am) the previous two mornings.  just as with the other sightings, this object made short, jutting motions in erratic directions.  in all sightings, i have a number of tall trees (and the frame of the windows in our home) to judge the position of the objects and their movement.  i watched this object first from our house, then from cr 519, hover and move high above the pole creek valley until it was no longer visible due to its distance.  

this routine, of observing these bright, flashing, jutting objects, from about 9:00 pm - 11:30 pm in the valley, and/or 3:00 am - 6:30 am over the divide, has continued for 21 days now, with the only exceptions being when it was cloudy.  i have several videos and still photos of both objects, taken over several different days, but can only attach a limited number here.  

it would be great if these objects could be identified, but as of yet, the handful of observers that have also seen these objects (friends and family) have no explanation. any suggestions on getting these objects identified would be appreciated.
content.summary: Two different unidentified flying objects flying above fraser valley, grand county, co

content.detailedDescription:
2 other couples and my girlfriend and i went to a lover's lane type spot north of indianapolis indiana in the fall creek area called geist resevoir. a popular place back then named "the point" near county line dock off fall creek road. the time was about 9pm-10pm at night. it was a clear moonless night and we were not drinking or high but just there for a little romance. an aircraft type light appeared moving slowly west across the other side of the resevoir. there were dog kennels across the water near this approaching red light. the 20 plus dogs began barking violently as this red light came near to the kennal. the object stopped directly over the kennel and a bright white light flashed from the bottom of the craft like a flash bulb and instantly all the dogs stopped barking. that got us all up off the ground and the girls wanting to leave
because of what we observed this craft's light effect on the wildly barking dogs. this light seemed to totally stop all those excited dogs from barking completely and the dogs never started barking again. it started to move slowly again in the same direction and then a light of the same intensity came out of the front and stayed on as it moved west.
it's right side dipped to it's right and it began to turn towards us and as it did, it's top appeared to us as a yellow orange domed surface with
round pulsating multi colored lights around it's edge on top. at this point all the girls about peed their pants and they all ran to the car that was less that a 100 yards away. as it completed it's turn towards our location, that bright front light bathed me and this other guy that stayed to watch and also the whole cliff we were standing on, but then it went out and the craft stayed stationary as if it was watching us. it began to move slowly again westward with an increased angle upward. suddenly it shot off like a bullet and the only way to discribe it was faster than a night time tracer round out of a military weapon and it was gone. we ran to the car and the girls were freaking out and said, "what took you guys so long?!!" we had to have the girls back at 12 midnight and we got them home near 2am. years later i learned of "lost time" and thought about this incident alot and came to the conclusion that we lost about an hour and 1/2 but this whole event only lasted at the most 15 minutes. i have always wanted this sighting to be investigated and this is the first official report i have made because the times i have told it, everybody thought that i was making it up or just crazy.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed craft with illuminus light that stopped dogs from barking when flashed

content.detailedDescription:
I was in west allis wi spring time 2007 with my 2 friends walking around at night it must have been 

9pm  we were near 68th and greenfield  and we all heard a loud jet engine roar as we look up we
 see two crafts
 
at a height you normally don���t see crafts flying at we notice  the two jets were traveling at a high 
speed

the gap between them was no more then 12 yards  they were triangle in shape a white light at the 

front tip one white light at each wing tip and in the center of the craft on the top side right where 

a cockpit would be was a red light all these lights were about the size of a golf ball just basically 

indicator lights . the crafts seemed it wasn���t solid it seemed to be transparent like see through 

and these jets were roaring  the sound was why we all looked up in the first place  well it must of 

took us 30-40 minutes to get to r friends house and through out the night we would look up too 

keep a eye on these supersonic  jets and i swear to you at on point it was on the east side of the 

city then the north,west, and south it was miles away from us in the sky but it circled the whole 

city there's just nothing i know of that can  circle around the city that fast it wasent natural we got 

to the house and just couldn���t stop talking about it . well fast forward to 10pm n here���s where the 

real juicy event happens me and my two friends walk up to the bus stop on 66th lincoln    my one 

friend lives down the street so he literally ran home my other friend stays with me   about 15 

minuets go by an  across the street from us is a 3-4 story tall building  an i just happened to be 

looking at the roof  and right over the top of this building i see this black triangular shape craft  

about the size of a fighter jet with the exact same lights as the crafts i saw prior only this time it 

was one of them and it wasent translucent it was black it hovered a few feet over the building top and then it continued to travle 

right above me at the same height as the roof top  but right before it came over me the craft tilted 

its body on a side way lean and as soon as it came over me and my buddy on the bottom of each 

wingtip two soft ball sized perfect circles just lit up white for about 2 seconds and then the 4 soft 

ball sized lights turned off  the craft  leveled again(it came  off its lean to straighten out) and it 

hoverd right over us down the block and we lost sight of it due to trees and houses 

and i noticed something up close

about the craft i didnt from earily when it was high in the air at high speeds 

 well when it hoverd over us i noticed yes it was triangular in shape

 but at the rear it had a stingray shaped tail about2-3 yards long and  while the whole time it was floaitng over us not one bit of 

sound was emitted from this craft while earlier at those high speeds those things were roaring  i 

mean when this thing was right over head of me if i had a rock i could of hit it
 i got on the bus ran home googled all the facts on what i saw mach 7 travle triangular shape and one thing poped up the aurora top secrect doesnt exsist air craft the only thing that dint match was the sting ray tail everything elese was righ on so i belive i saw a miltary aircraft not a ufo 


in short i saw with my freinds two jets travel aound the city at mach 7 the n latter that night only one of those jets haoverd over me silently took a photo or beamed four lights one me and then it contiued over my head down the block
content.summary: 2 tringle crafts circle city at high speed then later theat night one hovers over me

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down silverdart rd which is on the back side of the pearson intl. airport i stopped to film lightning for a bit then left.
i got home uploaded the videos and to my surprise i had filmed something that looked like a bright yellow/orange ball of light or sphere and it hovers around in the video for a bit then a strike of lightning comes and you actually see this object take off in the one directiong so fast it leaves the screen then it returns and flies away fast again.. i have the footage of this thing flying over pearson intl airport no one will get back to me i would like to show this video to you guys.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange yellow ball hovering in sky lightning strikes it flies away and comes back ..

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving out of my driveway at around 7:30 when i noticed 2 objects, orange in color,flying slowly across my field of vision. it took about 2 minutes for these objects to move from 0 to 40 degrees across my fov where they either completely disappeared or where hidden by cloud cover. it was at this point when i noticed a large egg or teardrop shaped object appearing to moved slowly towards and float above my neighbor's house. it was at this point when i left in my vehicle, but the object still seemed to be floating in the area when i left. i would describe the objects as similar in color to fire or electrical sparks. the third object appeared to be made of plasma or some sort of non-solid substance.I was scared enough during and after that i wasn't in the right mind to record the event, even though i had a camera with me.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First 2 glowing orbs traveling at similar speeds, then a large object appeared nearby.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up again around 2am staring out my window again.... and there again i witnessed
more strange lights. this was like a falling star i thought,  except when i looked it was a ball of light that was descending down towards my window very low and it had a trail following after.
it squirmed down towards my window like an eel in the air.
it lasted only a few seconds and once again i am shocked and getting sort of worried.
a few weeks before my daughter woke me up and said there was a buzzing noise over her bed like a wirily bird
i went in and she could still here it but fading away but i never hear it.
lots of strange things here by lax!
content.summary: Ball of light just out my window with a trail

content.detailedDescription: I came face to face with a roughly 9ft tall human with a chocolate lab's head on it. the devil is in the details here. i'm admittedly to lazy to type the whole account, however if you guys care to give me a call, i'll gladly discuss the matter in detail. as long as you share none of my personal info with no one.
content.summary: Accidental  face to face encounter

content.detailedDescription:
Woke up and saw a triangle shaped ship flying west over my head very low and out over the ocean and right under a landing plane at lax.
it was translucent except for a glowing outline of a triangle in white light.
it had three or four strange fins on the back like sharp knives. sticking straight out but 
very jagged. not like aircraft wings.
it was completely silent as it flew right over my head. i froze thinking again and saying to myself
out loud they are here!! they are here! i could not get my camera in time.
content.summary: Translucent triangle ship near lax with glowing light edges headed over the ocean under a plane,

content.detailedDescription: Driving east bound on us 60 between val vista and higley at 1923 hours i looked up to my right and saw a bright amber/orange object approx at a 40 degree angle off of the south/eastern horizon. if i held my fingers up to measurer the object, it would have been an inch between my fingers which may help give an idea of the distance of the object. it was difficult to estimate distance due to the darkness. the object looked like what a disc type object would from a side view and it was an extremely bright amber/orange and looked as if it was emanating light from the inside and had a soft glow around it. there was also a thin reddish line on the bottom. as i said, it was dark out which made this object very easy to see. suddenly the object shrunk in on itself and disappeared leaving 3 or 4 tiny blinking multi colored lights which also quickly disappeared. this lasted approx 30-35 seconds. i am sure this was not an airplane and it was definitely unusual.
content.summary: Amber/orange glowing object

content.detailedDescription:
The date of this event was between september-october of 1990, approx 8:00 p.M. est.  the location was phoenixville, pa (approx 40 w of philadelphia)it was so long ago i cannot remember the exact day which it happened, but i know it was during one of those months during that year.  

i was 13 years old at the time and getting ready to go bowling with my family.  my mother asked me to change the kitty litter, so i took the bag outside to our attached shed.  i have always been fascinated with the night sky, and as always looked up at the stars.  

flying directly over my head/house was a giant black triangle.  by giant i mean this thing was huge, approx 1500 feet along each side.  you could have fit an unknown number of the largest airplnes in the world inside the outline of this thing, it was massive.  as soon as i saw it, i dropped the kitty litter bag and key to the shed right where i stood.  i was scared and mesmerized at the same time.   

i watched this thing for about 3-4 minutes.  it had 3 smallish red lights at each point in the triangle.  it was low to the ground, maybe 1000-2000 ft at the most.  it made no noise whatsoever and flew over my house in a ese direction.  it did not deviate from this course at all and flew at a very slow speed.

it was a clear night, no clouds at all and the stars were visible. the object was solid as it blacked out all of the stars behind it.  when the object was starting to get further down on the horizon i came to my senses and ran inside to get my mom and grandmom to see this thing.  unfortunatly when i finally got them outside the object was too far away for them to see it as the triangle had gone far enough towards the horizon that the trees blocked it out.   

i haven't reported this before and have really only told my closest of friends as i didn't want people to think i was crazy, but i know what i saw, the sight of it is burned into my memory.  for some reason it has been on my mind alot recently and i felt like i had to tell soemone about this.  i can't think of any other details to relay.  i figured this would be all over the news and the newspapers at the time as i live in a fairly highly populated area but i have never heard a thing.  i still to this day am freaked out by what i saw as i can't possibly imagine this thing is earthly.
content.summary: Huge black triangle, silent, 3 red lights at points.  heading from wnw to ese.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up at a contrial of a commercial jet while talking to my dad, brother in law and sister.  i looked at the jet trail for a while and noticed something that looked like a yellow dull metalic sphere above the contrail.  i first thought it was a yellow child's balloon floating in the sky.  the object was just hovering motionless and i told my dad to go get his binoculars toget a better view of it. it stayed there for a long time, at least 20 minutes.  when my dad gave me the binoculars i looked at it and noticed it was a sphere with a yellow dull metalic surface that was at i would guess 50,000 feet in altitude, much higher than the airliner at 20-30000 feet in altitude.  i was able to see 3 aircraft now in a triangle hovering flight formation.  i noticed a fourth one close to the other 3 and it moved horizontally in a linear path slowly to the right and i noticed then 3 more spheres hovering motionless.  they all formed a trapezoid flight position.  the surprise came when some of them started glowing brightly as a bright yellow to white light. some of them changed shape to an elongated sphere and then looked disklike with edges on the outside of the shape.  they all stayed in formation for over 20 minutes and then some of them just disappeared as i was looking at them in my binoculars! my dad, brother in law,sister and later mom all heard me describe these objects while looking at them in the binoculars.  they were not very visible to the natural eye, just tiny starlike spheres. i watched them for a while as i looked at them they disappeared one by one but changed shape first and glowed a like a white brilliant light like snow with the sun reflecting off it or a bright mirror reflecting the sun.  i was amazed and it was like nothing i had ever seen and i had been to air shows by the air force.  i have seen weather balloons, balloons, helicopters at night and in daylight.  nothing was like these things.  they were at 50,000 feet in altitude at least and were motionless and not moving for 20+ minutes. they changed shape, appearance, and disappeared while viewing them.  one moved linearly and stopped as it formed a flight position to the other objects.  unbeliveable but actually happened.  i have been interested in ufos but did not believe that they existed for real.  i know they exist now!!!  i have seen some photos of the same kind of things on the internet and now i do believe they are real!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7 ufo objects sighted for over 20 minutes without moving and at 50000 feet in altitude.

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 19 15 on 9-13-11 i was returning home from bullhead city az on hwy 95 i was just passing the entrance to home depot when i noticed 5 v shape crafts flying in formation coming down the colorado river from the north. they were flying very slow and low only 50 feet or so from the river as they approached i stopped and watched them from the parking lot of home depot on hwy 95. they stopped in mid air and hovered for approx. 1.30 to 20 minutes they they started moving again the same direction they were they continued for another 200 yards then all of a sudden a blue white light flashed and they flew out of sight so fast i couldn't believe it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: i was driving home from bullhead city az and observed 5 crafts flying down the colorado river in formation then they stopped and hovered for several mins and then continued down the river.

content.detailedDescription:
After seeing an all white jumbo jet without any markings pass above me,   i noticed high above a small white object sitting motionless .  it did not move for at least 3-4 minutes.  i then ran inside and returned with my camera  canon 20 d  with zoom lens.   i took about 10 shots and called a neighbor  mike over to ask him to witness it.  he agreed he could not figure out what it could be? i asked him to remain there as i ran in to get my tripod. when i returned,
we then noticed it was moving slowly west and away from us.  i took about 10 more photos , 24 in all. 
then to my surprise it stopped and started moving back towards the  direction it started from.  this made me realize it could not be anything in orbit such as a planet , a satellite or the space station.
i took a few more photos as it hid behind the clouds and behind the side of my building.
when i downloaded the images, i was surprised to find it changing shape in every shot.  
i could not believe this was any kind of balloon or conventional craft i have ever seen or heard about.
the way this object sat motionless for over 3 minutes was most notable. i checked this  by in referencing  the object to my building and the telephone wires. then moving and changing direction was quite  amazing and perplexing.
i truly felt i witnessed something beyond the normal explanation. i also felt i acted with quick decision to get a camera, tripod and a witness to what i saw.
content.summary: white stationary object high in daytime sky .  then started to move and then reversed direction.

content.detailedDescription: This situation happened when i was around 19 driving with my brother. we were on a stretch of highway (20/131) leading north from grand rapids, michigan to cadillac. as i was driving with my brother in the passenger seat we noticed on the straight stretch of road that there was a really bright light to the left of a large hill top. the object looked like a really bright star that i thought was unusually bright. it was in my line of sight as we drove on the straight stretch for miles and hoovered. i didn't make much of it the light nor did i discuss the light with my brother as i drove. after awhile the bright light that was stationary dropped behind the hill top. i initially thought well it might be a car light behind me shinning on the windsheild so i didn't mention anything to my brother. my brother after about 10 seconds after seeing the light drop said did you see that light drop. then we discussed the fact that it couldn't have been car lights since it dropped behind the hill. the object was a few miles out from the car and fell way too fast to be a plane. the object went straight down and did not wobble on the way down. the object was perfectly round in shape and extremely bright like a flash light in the sky.
content.summary: Decending light

content.detailedDescription: Have unusual amount of activity in the backyard. have noted orbs, unusual amount of planes in flight path to the international airport about a mile from here as crow flies. unbelievably, saw a ship appear out of a haze of bright light then disappear within seconds. counted 4 shooting stars in a one hour period -one of which had a red tail just before seeing the ship. i have a small window on the universe but i cannot believe what is happening in my backyard.There seems to be several unusual star-like objects that hover above -one in particular that is stationary flashing multicolor lights. this one appears nightly. this all happened in one of viewing over a three to four hour period.I am now watching nightly when clear because they are concentrated in the area.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: Extreme activity/events near airport

content.detailedDescription: i lived just east of tucson an had observed on occasion a bright object motionlessly hovering over tucson. the object would pulsate various colors of light. i was curious about how a glowing object could remain motionless for so long, as it would hover for up to 20 to 30 minutes without being effected by winds or air currents. yet on the evening that i took some video there seemed to be a different object. the object i filmed was also motionless, yet did not pulsate light, rather it gave off a white glow. i do not know if the object was a weather balloon or not.  it seemed to be made up of three or four large glowing spheres connected together in a bit of a triangular fashion. it was pretty distant and i had some difficulty focusing in with my video camera. i've submitted still shots from some video taken of the object that evening.Perhaps someone out there will be able to determine if the object was a weather balloon or not.
content.summary: A stationary object that seemed to be three or four large spheres connected together.

content.detailedDescription:
Me, my wife and 2 friends were in a parking lot after eating dinner, when i noticed three orange-ish lights in a row traveling from east to west off in the distance just over the trees in our direction. "planes don't fly that close together do they?" i said. as we watched them come closer, the center light went higher forming a triangle juxtapose the other two. the lights one by one slowly ascended up in to the clouds out of view as they seperated further apart from each other. there was no sound. we shrugged it off and went to our cars and left. the lights would have been going towards the charlotte airport. as my wife and got in the car and left the parking lot we saw two more of the orange lights flying very close together. as they came closer one either went behind the other or joined the other making one light. they then seperated and put a greater distance between them. as i'm driving south on park road i continue to watch. i confirmed with my wife that we did in fact see the same event that took place. off in the distance above the trees there were three more aproaching. i kept waiting to hear a sound which would identify what we were seeing but never did. i observed one fly over us just below cloud cover and saw that the bottom looked exactly the same as they looked at a distance, an orb of orange light. i didn't pull over because i kept expecting to discover a logical explanation, tail lights or a sound. there was none. they were not planes (we see them all the time) and they were not helicopters. 
  the oddest part is we had just had a conversation about ufo's during dinner and surmised the possibilities of what they could be including the biblical interpretations of angels depicted as having wings because they fly in the sky like birds. the last time you ever expect to see something like this is when you just get through talking about it. we were perplexed by the experience. i kept driving and lost sight of them as i needed to watch the road. i haven't stopped thinking about it since. we saw ufo's.
content.summary: Orange lights that appeared to fly like controlled ballons (straight and random)

content.detailedDescription: I was around 16 when this situation happened. a friend and i where walking back after a day of playing around at a junk yard behind my mothers house. it was approximately around 7-730pm and was just getting dark when we decided to leave the junk yard. we crossed over a set of rail road tracks to head onto the trail that lead back to my mothers house when a really bright light over head hit us both with a blinding white light. from my memory i remember the light being so bright all you could really see was white and dark shadows in the wooded areas. i had the sensation that something large was over our heads when i looked at my friend that was with me and yelled to run. the light flicked off as we were running through the wooded area back to my mothers house. neither of us looked back or up while running until we reached my mothers back yard. the time it took us to reach the yard was approximately 5 minutes. we looked up and noticed nothing unusual in the clear nights sky. we walked around to the front of my mothers yard discussing what things it could have been. we came around the corner of the house and my sister and her boyfriend were sitting on his car talking. we asked if they had seen or heard any helicopters from the base that was approximately 20 miles away. they replied no they didn't see anything or hear anything near the house. the distance from my mothers house to where this experience happened was around a mile and a half. the approximate time the light was over our head was brief and i wouldn't put it past a few seconds.
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription: Driving thru the night from sioux falls sd to tama iowa.  around 3:30 am i was behind a truck towing a trailer, suddenly a huge whump whump whump from the sky made me look up.  a huge black object with white dashes of lights appeared - the sound made it seem like the object was braking before hitting the earth.  the black object against the black sky immediately made me think it was a ufo.  the vehicle in front of me swerved back and forth on the highway - finally pulling over.  when i first heard the noise - i tried to wake up my passenger - but he would not wake up.  i pounded on his arm and screamed his name and he would not wake up.  the object hovered above the highway for a moment and then ascended back into the sky from my perspective in a straight up heading just to left of my view.  the object filled 1/4 of the sky - maybe it was 50-100 feet above us.  i thought oh no - not again!  i admit i was afraid because i could not wake the person with me.  a friend said it was probably a black helicopter - but aside from the fact it was way too big for any helicopter i have seen, the whump sound only came when it appeared to brake above us , and then the abrupt direction change was not accompanied by sound and it zipped straight up out of sight - admittedly - it was black but it also had white dashed lights along a varied surface bottom.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On hwy30 north of ames huge black ufo with lights slowed down above cars

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 9:45pm as i was sitting on my deck and i saw very large orange pulsating lights.  they were rectangular shaped and there were 5 of them as i recall.  i only saw them for 5-10 sec. before they simply went out.  there was no noise at all and since i had lights on behind me i was unable to tell if there was any type of vehicle.  i didn't have time to get any pictures. i recently spoke with another woman who saw something the same night.  she said what she saw was out of "close encounters of the third kind" a large disc shaped object with beams of light coming from the bottom.  she said this happened at about 8:30pm 8/15/2011.  i called the local sheriff's office and they said they didn't have any reports of strange lights.
content.summary: 5 orange pulsating lights hovering over lake of the ozarks

content.detailedDescription: After putting the children to bed i went out to look at the stars. our street lights were all out because of a severe hailstorm so the night sky was much more visible than usual. i had only been out for a minute when i noticed a bright light to the northeast about 45 degrees above the horizon. it was orange with slightly silver edge around it. at first i thought it was a star because it had a twinkling effect to it but it was too large and too bright. then i thought of an airplane because of the two colors and the slightly ovoid shape... but the lights didn't blink and the whole thing was orange. venus became visible just a about 30 degrees south and i noticed it was about the same brightness and 2-3 times larger. while it was stationary for 2-3 minutes it did begin to rise slowly... about 5 degrees higher before it seemed to just fade into the distance. it seemed that the light was either moving directly away from me or it faded out while shrinking. there were no observable effects or sounds that i associated with it and was otherwise unremarkable. i could not tell how large it was or whether it was astronomical or atmospheric... there were no clouds, planes, or stars visible near it at the time. size and altitude were indeterminable.
content.summary: An orange light in the northeastern sky at dusk just before the stars came out, hovered for a while before rising slowly and disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from big river marina traveling down hwy 30 when i noticed something odd looking in the sky.  at first i though it was a street light but realized that there are no street lights where i was and it was too big. i kept watching it through the trees and when i came around the bend i got a better look at it through a clearing.  i was silver shaped, oblong and flying fairly low. i thought it may have been a helicopter but it was traveling too fast.  it went sideways and flew n/e very fast.
content.summary: Silver craft flying low near high ridge missouri

content.detailedDescription:
Was at my computer in my home office at the front of the house.  my two dogs were sitting in the window looking outside.  suddenly my female dog started howling & when i turned my head to look at them, they were both looking towards the sky.

i got up from my chair, looked out the window in the direction they were staring and saw a shiny object.  at first i thought it might be a weather balloon because this is albuquerque and it looked like it was kind of in the direction of kirtland ab, but then suddenly the hair stood up on my head, neck & arms because it disappeared & reappeared nanoseconds later.  i grabbed my camera & took the first shot thru my window & screen.  it looked big but my little nikon couldn't capture what i saw. 

so i went to put on my shoes to go outside for a better shot and realized my dogs had run to one of the bedrooms, jumped on the bed, and the female was still howling.  

when i went outside to the front of my house, it was still there so i took the second shot & almost immediately took the third shot.  but as i clicked it the second time, i didn't see anything in the viewfinder at the time so i thought i missed the third shot.

i lowered the camera and scanned the sky for the object but it was gone.  as you can see, it was a clear morning in albuquerque.  

when i downloaded my pics a few hours later, i saw that indeed i had caught the third shot.

the camera time says 12:52 pm but it was really more like around 6:45-7:00 in the morning when the photos were taken.
content.summary: Saw something hovering in the sky then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a seemingly normal summer night in june of 1995.  my oldest brother (18 years old) was driving me (13 years old), my middle brother (16 years old), and my middle brother's girlfriend (17 years old) home from seeing batman forever at the movie theater.  honestly, looking back, the only thing abnormal about the night was the abundance of lightning in the sky.  we all noticed that and commented on the fact we were having a lot of "dry lightning" that night.  in fact, it was so intense that we stopped at the local cemetery and turned off the headlights and watched the sky light up almost constantly.  i believe we sat there for a few moments and reminisced about old ghost stories we had heard growing up before heading out to continue the trip to take my brother's girlfriend home. it was close to midnight.

after driving across the mountains and after dropping my brother's girlfriend off at her house, we began our journey home.  still, the lightning was flashing continuously...But we thought nothing of it.  

it wasn't until we were driving down the largest mountain we crossed that we spotted something in the sky that appeared to be the moon at first glance--it was circular in shape and gave off light.  however, the only reason we knew it wasn't the moon is because we could see it better when the lightning flashed and further illuminated the object.  my brother asked, "what is that? " and all three of us stared curiously at this round object in the sky.  we knew it definitely wasn't the moon when we realized the object was moving.  at one point my oldest brother asked, "is it following us?"

we sat in awe as we drove down the only road home trying our best to keep our eyes on this strange object in the sky.  my heart pounded in my chest as the car drove down the road and almost stopped after driving over a small hill about 1.5 miles from home.  my brother immediately stopped the car upon seeing the sight: in a field 70-100 yards in front of us was a flaming circular object that hovered in the air as a constant stream of lightning shot down to the ground while other bolts of lightning shot out of it in all directions. it looked to be about 50 feet off of the ground and at arm's length, it looked to be the size of a quarter.  

we were terrified and looked at each other with our mouths gaped open in shock, wondering if we were all witnessing the same thing.  in reality, we thought it was the end of the world and began praying.  my brother wouldn't budge the small vehicle and we sat there for what seemed to be several minutes wondering if it was the end of our lives while staring at this impossible sight in front of us.  finally i told my brother to speed past the object to make it home to our parents, but he was hesitant since the object was fairly close to the paved, one-lane road.  i started to cry and somehow my brother found the courage to drive home.  when we moved, it moved fluidly away from the field and appeared to be following us.  we sped down the country road while trying our best to keep our eyes in the sky.

we woke our parents up immediately upon getting home and we all tried explaining what we saw in the sky to my mother.  we even tried showing her the object out of the bathroom window, but at that point, it was already sinking down and was hidden behind the thick line of trees in the western horizon.

to this day, we still talk about that night and wonder what it was we saw.  we all agree on one thing: whatever it was, it wanted to be seen.  we only wonder why.
content.summary: Ball of flame hovered over field with lightning constantly shooting out of it
